test.name: Get List of All the Products

kw.name: Get the list of All the Products from API
GET
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://automationexercise.com/api/productsList path_url=/api/productsList headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request.
This keyword retrieves the list of all products from the API and returns the response.
